collections-xml-form.warning-top:
Hover your mouse over an item to display its information.
- Texts typed will be validated.
collections-xml-form.xml-type-warning: The aim of the file may determine the use and name of some TAGs as mandatory or not
collections-xml-form.file-name-warning: Name of the Xml file up to 60 characters will be used in the URL to view the result of this file. Eg.: name / file_name
collections-xml-form.collection-warning: Collection of Products that will be listed. Please make sure the Collection allows the display of Inactive Products.
collections-xml-form.ean13-tooltip-text: 13-digit code equivalent to the Sku bar code. Ex.: ean13 / codigo_ean / code
collections-xml-form.sku-id-tooltip-text: Unique SKU identification number. Ex.: idsku / id_sku
collections-xml-form.add-link-tooltip-text: In addition to the Link to product page, this tag can add utm_source to the end of the URL (www.url.com?utm_source=typedtext). Ex.: link / product_link
collections-xml-form.currency-symbol-hover: Currency symbol to be used in prices. Eg: US$
collections-xml-form.encoding-type-warning: Encoding type used in this Xml
collections-xml-form.item-tag-tooltip-text: This Tag is the Item where all the information below will be contained. Each Item will have the same Tags, varying only its content. Ex.: product / item
collections-xml-form.root-tag-tooltip-text: This is the main Tag, where Item Tags with the information below will be grouped. Ex.: store / namesite / site_name
collections-xml-form.tax-code-tooltip-text: Product Tax Code. Ex.: taxcode / tax_code
collections-xml-form.additional-xml-warning: CAUTION: Incorrect use of this field may invalidate the entire XML file.
collections-xml-form.index-tag-tooltip-text: This tag will assign a number to each item, in increasing sequence starting from number 1. Ex.: number / index / id_item
collections-xml-form.sku-width-tooltip-text: Sku's width in centimeters. Ex.: width
collections-xml-form.product-id-tooltip-text: Unique product identification number. Ex.: product / product_id
collections-xml-form.sku-height-tooltip-text: Sku's height in centimeters. Ex.: height
collections-xml-form.sku-length-tooltip-text: Sku's length in centimeters. Ex.: length
collections-xml-form.sku-status-tooltip-text: SKU active or inactive status. A SKU may be Inactive even if you have availability in Inventory and vice versa. Also check that the selected Collection allows the display of inactive Products. Ex.: status / active
collections-xml-form.sku-weight-tooltip-text: Sku's weight in grams. Ex.: weight
collections-xml-form.utm-medium-tooltip-text: Media Name added to the end of the URL. This attribute will be used if filled in. Ex.: medianame / destinationsite
collections-xml-form.utm-source-tooltip-text: Partner Name added to the end of the URL. This attribute will be used if filled in. Ex.: partnername / destinationsite
collections-xml-form.attribute-1-tooltip-text: Root Tag Attribute. Ex.: version / xmlns / g: xmlns
collections-xml-form.attribute-2-tooltip-text: Root Tag Attribute. Ex.: version / xmlns / g: xmlns
collections-xml-form.attribute-3-tooltip-text: Root Tag Attribute. Ex.: version / xmlns / g: xmlns
collections-xml-form.button-back-tooltip-text: Cancel and return to the file listing
collections-xml-form.button-save-tooltip-text: Check for mistakes in the form and Save
collections-xml-form.installment-tooltip-text: The largest number of parcels with the lowest interest rate available and the amount of the parcel in a single Tag. Ex.: installment
collections-xml-form.message-inform-addressee: Remember to inform the addressee of this file about your modifications.
collections-xml-form.subroot-tag-tooltip-text: This is a child of the Root Tag and will receive all its content without replacing it. Ex.: branch / matrix / channel
collections-xml-form.title-column-field-hover: Information that will be displayed by the Tag if its Content is marked.
collections-xml-form.xml-comment-tooltip-text: Free text comment in file. This item supports up to 60 characters and will only be displayed once before the Root Tag.
collections-xml-form.availability-tooltip-text: SKU availability in Inventory. A SKU may be available even if it is Inactive. Ex.: availability/delivery
collections-xml-form.message-select-collection: Select a Collection to use this file.
collections-xml-form.utm-campaign-tooltip-text: Campaign Name added to the end of the URL. This attribute will be used if filled in. Ex.: campaignname / destinationsite
collections-xml-form.utm-keywords-tooltip-text: Keyword added to the end of the URL. This attribute will be used if filled in. Ex.: medianame / destinationsite
collections-xml-form.add-open-tag-1-tooltip-text: Free content tag. This tag will be repeated for each item. Ex.: date / author / any_ thing
collections-xml-form.add-open-tag-2-tooltip-text: Free content tag. This tag will be repeated for each item. Ex.: date / author / any_ thing
collections-xml-form.additional-xml-tooltip-text: Allows the addition of a valid XML stretch of free content and up to 500 characters to be embedded directly into the Root Tag (or SubRoot) before the Item Tags
collections-xml-form.title-column-tag-name-hover: Tags with up to 25 characters. Tags without a Name will not show up in the generated Item and Tags with a Name will show up even without any content.
collections-xml-form.type-two-image-tooltip-text: Main Product Image. Ex.: image / product_image
collections-xml-form.installment-item-tooltip-text: Each Payment Method will be an Item. Ex.: payment / option
collections-xml-form.show-unavailable-skus-warning: Show SKUs out of stock (sold-out) in the results
collections-xml-form.installment-value-tooltip-text: Installment value for the Sku Current Price. Ex.: value / installment_value
collections-xml-form.root-attribute-1-content-hover: Attribute's value in up to 200 characters.
collections-xml-form.root-attribute-2-content-hover: Attribute's value in up to 200 characters.
collections-xml-form.root-attribute-3-content-hover: Attribute's value in up to 200 characters.
collections-xml-form.sku-selling-price-tooltip-text: Current Sku selling price. Sale price. Ex: current_price / selling_price
collections-xml-form.sku-specification-tooltip-text: Each specification there is in a SKU.
collections-xml-form.open-tag-1-content-tooltip-text: Text with up to 200 characters that will be repeated for all items without being changed.
collections-xml-form.open-tag-2-content-tooltip-text: Text with up to 200 characters that will be repeated for all items without being changed.
collections-xml-form.sku-original-price-tooltip-text: Sku price without discounts. Real Price, Full Price or Table Value, Ex.: previous_price / normal_price
collections-xml-form.sku-reference-code-tooltip-text: Sku Reference Code. Ex.: reference / reference_code
collections-xml-form.title-column-show-content-hover: Check to display the content entered in the Field.
collections-xml-form.add-specific-images-tooltip-text: A tag containing separate tags for the URLs of each image. Ex.: image / product_image
collections-xml-form.department-category-tooltip-text: Departament and Product Categorry separated by a hyphen. Ex.: department / category
collections-xml-form.number-installments-tooltip-text: Maximum number of installments of a payment method for the SKU Current Price. Ex.: installment / number_installment
collections-xml-form.payment-method-name-tooltip-text: Name of the payment method. Ex.: name / title
collections-xml-form.shop-window-image-1-tooltip-text: Product Image in Shop Window 1. Ex.: image / image1
collections-xml-form.shop-window-image-2-tooltip-text: Product Image in Shop Window 2. Ex.: image / image2
collections-xml-form.shop-window-image-3-tooltip-text: Product Image in Shop Window 3. Ex.: image / image3
collections-xml-form.show-product-sku-default-warning: Each product will be in the list only once with the default SKU data if the SKU properties are selected.
collections-xml-form.type-two-main-image-tooltip-text: Main Product Image. Ex.: image / main_image
collections-xml-form.product-lowest-price-tooltip-text: Price of the cheapest Sku of the Product. Ex.: min_price / minimum_price
collections-xml-form.product-zoomed-image-tooltip-text: Product's Zoomed Image. Ex.: zoom / zoomed
collections-xml-form.product-highest-price-tooltip-text: Price of the most expensive Sku of the Product. Ex.: max_price / maximum_price
collections-xml-form.product-name-sku-name-tooltip-text: Product name and Sku name separated by a hyphen. If the names are similar, the most complete name will be used. Ex.: name / sku_name / product_name
collections-xml-form.add-sku-specifications-tooltip-text: SKU specifications: A SKU can have numerous specifications. Ex.: color - green / size - large.
collections-xml-form.message-file-entered-does-not-exist: The file you entered does not exist.
collections-xml-form.product-reference-code-tooltip-text: Product Reference Code. Ex.: reference / reference_code
collections-xml-form.product-thumbnail-image-tooltip-text: Product's Thumbnail Image. Ex.: thumb / thumbnail
collections-xml-form.sku-selling-price-taxes-tooltip-text: Current Sku sale price with taxes included.
collections-xml-form.google-installment-value-tooltip-text: Installment value for the Sku Current Price. Ex.: g:amount
collections-xml-form.add-detailed-installments-tooltip-text: Detail of the best possible installments, with interest and value per installment of each active Payment Condition for the SKU. Ex.: installment
collections-xml-form.installment-interest-rate-tooltip-text: Monthly Installment Interest Rate. Ex.: interestrate / monthly_interest_rate
collections-xml-form.google-payment-method-name-tooltip-text: Name of the payment method. Ex.: name / title
collections-xml-form.number-google-installments-tooltip-text: Maximum number of installments of a payment method for the SKU Current Price. Ex.: g:months
collections-xml-form.google-shopping-availability-tooltip-tex: SKU availability in Inventory. A SKU may be available even if it is Inactive. Ex.: availability/delivery
collections-xml-form.add-google-shopping-installment-tooltip-: Detailing of the highest number of installments with the lowest available interest rate and the value of the installment in separate Tags. Ex.: g: installment
collections-xml-form.google-installment-interest-rate-tooltip: Monthly Interest Rate. Ex.: interestrate / monthly_interest_rate
collections-xml-form.number-installments-installment-interest: Number of Installments and Installment Interest Rate
Maximum number of installments of a payment method for the SKU Current Price and Interest Rate in the form of the 'Interest' attribute inside the Tag. Ex.: installment / installment_interest
collections-xml-form.number-google-installments-google-instal: Number of Installments and Installment Interest Rate
Maximum number of installments of a payment method for the SKU Current Price and Interest Rate in the form of the 'Interest' attribute inside the Tag. Ex.: installment / installment_interest

product-ratings-export-page.instructions1: To export a spreadsheet, right-click a category on the side menu and choose the option “Export”.
product-ratings-export-page.instructions2: Always choose the innermost category from the desired department. This will make the listing and export process go faster.
product-ratings-export-page.instructions3: After clicking on the 'Export' button, select 'Save As' and choose a place to save the spreadsheet you’ve just exported.
product-ratings-export-page.instructions4: View the exported values using the spreadsheet editor Microsoft Excel or compatible.

sku-attach-service-price.title: Attach Service(s) Value(s) to SKU(s)
sku-attach-service-price.description1: Check the Help for the admin before importing the service values to attach to SKUs.
sku-attach-service-price.description2: To export service values from a specific category, click with the right mouse button in the list of categories in the right-side menu.
sku-attach-service-price.description3: Always select the most internal category of the desired department. This will make the listing, exporting and importing happen faster.
sku-attach-service-price.description4: If you want to import values, export a spreadsheet and use it as a model.
sku-attach-service-price.description5: Make the changes to import new values with Excel or similar.
sku-attach-service-price.description6: After you open the file, if you get a notification about a different file format from specified in the extension, ignore it selecting the option "Yes, open the file now ".
sku-attach-service-price.description7: Do not change the original file format (XML Spreadsheet 2003 with extension *.xls). Whenever you save the document, keep your current format even if some resources are unavailable.
sku-attach-service-price.description8: The spreadsheet file size cannot exceed 4Mb (4096KB).
sku-attach-service-price.description9: Edit the spreadsheet carefully, always verifying if the information is being filled correctly.

sku-attach-service-price.hover-see-errors: Hover over to see the errors the system returned.

sku-specification-export-import-page.title: SKU Specification Export and Import
sku-specification-export-import-page.table-title: Right-click a category and select list to see the products in a category.
sku-specification-export-import-page.attention-text:
Check the products/SKUs specification import manual.

To import, use a previously exported spreadsheet. To obtain it, choose a category from the left menu and then the option "Export", accessible after right-clicking it.

Always select the innermost category from the desired department. This will make the listing, export and import process go faster.

After clicking the "Export" button, choose the "Save As" option and choose the appropriate place to save the spreadsheet.

Modify the exported values with the spreadsheet editor Microsoft Excel or compatible.

Do not change the file original format (XML Spreadsheet2003 with the *.xls extension). Whenever saving the document, keep its current format even if some funcionalities become unavailable.

Only modify the column "Valor(es) de Especificação do SKU" from the spreadsheet. The other columns must remain unaltered because their values will be used for data validation.

For the fields of type "Text", there will be no content in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo SKU". Just insert/remove the text in/from the column "Valor(es) de Especificação do SKU".

For the fields of type "Long text", the procedure is the same as the one for fields of type "Text". However, you may add the text "#novalinha#" (without the enclosing double quotes) to set a line break in the text.

For the fields of type "Radio or Combo", copy the exact content of only one of the values listed in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo SKU".

For the fields of type "Checkbox", copy the exact content of one or more values listed in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo SKU". Separate the different values using commas, with up to one whitespace between the comma and the next value.

Edit the spreadsheet with extreme caution, always checking if everything was filled in correctly.

sku-service-type-form.form-attachments-info:
An attachment is used to add a customized information about a service buyer or about the item that was bought.

Example:
Service bought -> "Gift package for a shirt"
Attachment name -> "Message"
Key 1 -> "Text"

That means the gift package for this specific shirt will have a attachment named "message", mandatory or not, which the key will be the "Text" that will receive the message content.

If you want to register a new attachment,

Displays address selection in list creation
the value of products and freight (to the address selected by the creator of the list) will be converted into purchases worth
the value of each purchase will be assigned to the purchase order of the list as a recharge

info.1:
This guide has the functionality of reassociating this SKU to another SKU registered in the system by another seller.

The scenario, for example, is when the SKU is sold by Sellers X and Y, but there was a hint of approval created by two Products, one for each Seller, instead of associating the SKU and maintain a Product only.
This case may occur when the approved SKUs have different EANs. It’s desirable to unite the duplicated SKUs in a single Product.

advanced-settings.label: Advanced Settings
advanced-settings.modal-tooltip: It is used to differentiate skus delivery. Items with Modal set can only be delivered by carriers with the same modal.
advanced-settings.attachments-info:
An Attachment is used to add custom information from customer of a service or of the purchased item

Example:.

Item Purchased -> "Official shirt of the Brazilian team "

Attach name -> " Custom "

key 1 -> key Name: " name "Maximum characters allowed: 20
key 2 -> key Name: "Number " allowed values: "5,7,9,10,11 "

This means that an official shirt of the Brazilian Team will have an Attachment called "Custom ", mandatory or not, whose keys are the "name " and "Number " to be printed on the shirt purchased as the customer's choice. The customer can enter a name up to 20 characters (you can enter a free name), but will have to choose between numbers 5, 7, 9, 10 and 11 (can not enter the numbers you want).

If you want to register a new Attachment not yet existing in the System
advanced-settings.activate-kit-alert: After selecting this option and saving SKU, it will not be possible to undo
advanced-settings.dinamic-price-alert: If Selected, bundle will charge the sum of each SKU selling value
advanced-settings.generate-credit-info:
Select YES only if this sku is intended for use in the List of events of the type that generates credits to gift cards
. Caution: improper use of this field will undermine the normal process of selling this item.
advanced-settings.generate-credit-tooltip: It is used to create a kind of Event List, which generates a purchase credit to the owner of the List, with the value of the items purchased. Ex: Wedding List, Baby Shower.
advanced-settings.is-stock-availability-tooltip: This SKU has limited availability due to low invetory
advanced-settings.is-fisic-delivery-requires-tooltip: This SKU requires delivery (Eg .: Post, Carrier) and may suffer freight calculation.

attachment-page.title: Administrator - Attachment Register for Services and SKUs
attachment-page.explanation:
An attachment is used to add custom information about the buyer of a service or the item purchased.

Example:

Item purchased -> "Official Jersey of the Brazilian National Team"

Attachment Name -> "Customization"

Key1 -> Key name: "Name", Maximum characters allowed: 20
Key2 -> Key name: "Number", Permitted values: "5, 7, 9, 10, 11"

This means that an official jersey of the national team will have an attachment called "Customization", mandatory or not, whose keys will be "Name" and "Number", to be printed on the jersey bought according to the buyer's choice. The buyer can enter a name of up to 20 characters (any name they want), but they will have to choose between numbers 5, 7, 9, 10 and 11 (they will not be able to type any other number).

product-specification-export-import-page.title: Product Specification Export and Import
product-specification-export-import-page.attention-text:
Check the products/SKUs specification import manual.

To import, use a previously exported spreadsheet. To obtain it, choose a category from the left menu and then the option "Export", accessible after right-clicking it.

Always select the innermost category from the desired department. This will make the listing, export and import process go faster.

After clicking the "Export" button, choose the "Save As" option and choose the appropriate place to save the spreadsheet.

Modify the exported values with the spreadsheet editor Microsoft Excel or compatible.

Do not change the file original format (XML Spreadsheet2003 with the *.xls extension). Whenever saving the document, keep its current format even if some funcionalities become unavailable.

Only modify the column "Valor(es) de Especificação do Produto" from the spreadsheet. The other columns must remain unaltered because their values will be used for data validation.

For the fields "Text", there will be no content in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo Produto". Just insert/remove the text in/from the column "Valor(es) de Especificação do Produto".

For the fields of type "Long text", the procedure is the same as the one for fields of type "Text". However, you may add the text "#novalinha#" (without the enclosing double quotes) to set a line break in the text.

For the fields of type "Radio or Combo", copy the exact content of only one of the values listed in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo Produto".

For the fields of type "Checkbox", copy the exact content of one or more values listed in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo Produto". Separate the different values using commas, with up to one whitespace between the comma and the next value.

Edit the spreadsheet with extreme caution, always checking if everything was filled in correctly.
product-specification-export-import-page.right-click-category: Right-click a category and select list to see the products in a category.

sku-report.title: Export and Import SKUs and Products
sku-report.export-info:
Attention

The export refers to a complete report of Products and SKU, containing more information than the list found here.

After the data is processed, you will receive a link by e-mail to download the generated spreadsheet.

We recomend exporting up to 10.000 records. If the number of records is much bigger than this, the process can take long.

Use the filters to refine your search.

Wait for the export completed notification email. Depending on the search filters, the process can take a few minutes.
sku-report.import-info:
Attention, manage the spreadsheet with care, always verifying if the product and SKU information is filled correctly.


If you want to register more than one SKU for the same product, edit just the information about the SKU and keep the values of the following columns for that product:

_IdProduto, _NomeProduto, _TextoLink, _IdCategoria, _IdMarca, _CodigosLojas

Columns that will have the default value "NÃO" (NO) when creating a new record: _SkuAtivo (ActiveSKU) and _ProdutoAtivo (ActiveProduct).

If you want to force a value for the column _IdProduto (ProductID), make sure it's a new record and that it has a unique _TextoLink (LinkText).

If you want to edit the column _TextoLink (LinkText), make sure it will be changed for ALL SKUs of that product.

The column _AtivarSkuSePossível (ActivateSKUIfPossible) will inactivate the SKU with the "NÃO" (NO) value. In case of "SIM" (YES) value, the system will activate the SKU if the necessary requisites are met.

The following columns are present just to make reading the data easier, and will be ignored if edited or created: _NomeCategoria (NameCategory), _NomeMarca (NameBrand) and _NomeDepartamento (NameDepartment)
Edit only the following columns: _IdCategoria (IdCategory) and _IdMarca (IdBrand).

The following columns must be filled with the IDs for the SKUs separated by ',' (comma) during import: _Acessorios (Accessories), _Similares (Similars) and _Sugestoes (Suggestions)

The column _Anexos (Attachments) must be filled with the names of the attachments to be associated to SKUs, separated by ',' (comma).

OBS: At least one of the columns below must be filled when a new SKU is created in the spreadsheet: _SkuEan (SKU EAN) or _CodigoReferenciaSKU (SKUReferenceCode)

Values valid for the column _UnidadeMedida (UnitMeasure): "un", "kg", "g", "mg", "m", "m²", "m³", "cm", "cm²", "cm³", "mm", "mm²", "mm³";

Attention to the mandatory columns to register a new SKU in the spreadsheet:

_NomeSku (SKUName), _NomeProduto (ProductName), _AtivaSkuSePossível (ActivateSKUIfPossible) _ExibeNoSite (DisplayOnSite) _UnidadeMedida (UnitMeasure) _IdCategoria (CategoryId), _IdMarca (BrandId), _TextoLink (LinkText), _MultiplicadorUnidade (UnitMultiplier) , _Peso (Weight), _Altura (Height), _Largura (Width), _Comprimento (Length), _ExibeSemEstoque (DisplayWithoutStock)

Attention to the columns that should NOT be changed for existing records

_SkuId (SKUId), _SkuAtivo (ActiveSKU), _ProdutoAtivo (ActiveProduct), _NomeCategoria (CategoryName), _NomeMarca (BrandName), _IdDepartamento (DepartmentId)

The import will not run if any necessary column is blank in the sheet.

image-import-page.title: Image Import
image-import-page.attention-text:
• To import images verify that the file is in the right format. You can also check a model file here.
  • The imported images are included in their respective SKUs, so an image that is already registered won't be removed. But note that if some image is duplicated, the SKU will keep both.
  • Fill the field below with your email to receive a process status report.
  • The "TextImage" field will be linked to the image "title" attribute. If the attribute is not specified, it will have the Product and SKU name.
  • Keep the information below before you start to export. It will be really important if an error is detected.
